introduction: On New Year's Eve, a homeless man unexpectedly finds a newborn baby recently left in a trash container. Shocked by his unfortunate discovery he tries to find help. His attempts bring no result - no one around, including police officers, believes him. Overwhelmed by the lack of social support and absorbed in painful memories of the loss of his own child and everything else he valued in life, including his home, he decides to save the baby at any cost. The homeless man wraps the newborn into his winter jacket, and risking his own life, finds the way to the nearest police station.
